programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In London during the swinging sixties, a promiscuous Cockney lad who lacks purpose or direction habitually seduces women and then moves on. When one of his girlfriends becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, preferring instead to carry on with more conquests, but eventually something happens which forces him to reconsider his shallow existence.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his apartment by his girlfriend, Steven hears that if he slips a cable guy $50, he can get hooked up with free cable - but at what further cost? Can Steven gently reject the cable guys insane attempts to be best buds and also get his girlfriend back?

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but hes shocked when his father stipulates he wont unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A research scientist becomes the worlds first pregnant man in order to test a drug he and a colleague have designed for expectant women. To carry out the trial, he has an embryo implant, believing that he will only carry the baby for three months - hardly expecting to face the prospect of giving birth.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Dual
programme.desc: Upon receiving a terminal diagnosis, Sarah opts for a cloning procedure to ease her loss on her friends and family. When she makes a miraculous recovery, her attempts to decommission her clone fail, leading to a court-mandated duel to the death.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Alice travels to the Hive in Raccoon City to prevent the evil Umbrella Corp. from wiping out the last remaining survivors of the zombie apocalypse.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: When his father is injured, a youth traverses hostile terrain to recover a rescue beacon.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: I Dont Understand You
programme.desc: Stranded in rural Italy, an American couple on the verge of adopting tries to reconnect during a disastrous holiday.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm `snuff films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: Reuniting after the tragic death of their friend, four college friends set out to hike through the Scandinavian wilderness. But a wrong turn leads them into the mysterious forests of Norse legend, where an ancient evil stalks them at every turn.

programme.title: The Accursed
programme.desc: Elly is asked by a family friend to look after an elderly woman living in a remote cabin. She agrees, but soon discovers there is a demon hiding in the woman just waiting to break free.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Videodrome
programme.desc: A television executive searching for the ultimate show for his sex-based network comes across `Videodrome, a pirate broadcast of what appears to be pornographic snuff films. Trying to track down the makers, he enters a world of extreme sex and violence in one of David Cronenbergs early films that, while explicit, also satirises the media industry and its attempts at mind-control.

programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoners psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: Sew Torn
programme.desc: A seamstress gets tangled in her own thread after stealing a briefcase from a drug deal gone bad. In an escalating game of cat and mouse, her different choices lead to drastically different outcomes along the way.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Bold, Black and British
programme.desc: A powerful collection spotlighting the best Black British actors on the silver screen, featuring standout performances in `Wicked, `The Independent, `Aisha and `The Killer.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.title: Cult Killer
programme.desc: A private investigator is forced into a dangerous alliance with a killer to uncover a towns grisly criminal underbelly and clear the name of her mentor, who is implicated in the crimes.

programme.title: He Went That Way
programme.desc: Accompanied by his pet chimpanzee, a celebrity animal trainer picks up a hitchhiker, only to discover his passenger is a cunning young serial killer.

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: After Will Spanns wife suddenly vanishes at a gas station, his desperate search to find her leads him down a dark path that forces him to run from authorities and take the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoners psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russias first nuclear submarine and his executive officers first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: The famous ex-cop known as Shaft sets out to nail Walter Wade Jnr, a killer using his rich-kid connections to escape conviction, but as Shafts net draws tighter, he has to contend with killers employed by a desperate Wade.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The sun is beating down in Oceanside, bringing out all the parasols.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Way of the Gam Gam
programme.desc: While in Santa Ana, Lisa channels her grandmother, in trying to turn a profit. Brandi is dealing with the most frustrating day ever. Darrell tries to make a meal out of a snack-sized locker and Kenny learns to prep himself for true stealthiness.

programme.title: Irish Pickers
programme.desc: Ian and Butzy are searching for treasures in Irelands largest county - Cork. They go picking at an 11th Century castle built by the grandson of Brian Boru, high king of Ireland. Undeterred by its turbulent past and tales of ghosts Ian discovers a mysterious stone head, a carving of a famous figure from Irish mythology, and a gadget he just loves even though it dates not from the 1060s but the 1960s.

programme.title: Canadian Pickers

programme.desc: An alien macroviral lifeform seizes Voyager and disables the ship, and the Doctor goes on his first mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Wesleys experiment with a warp bubble goes disastrously wrong, causing the Enterprise crew to disappear, one by one.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.sub-title: Adjoa Andoh, Cat Burns, Clara Amfo
programme.desc: Adjoa Andoh, Cat Burns, Clara Amfo: The artists are challenged to capture on canvas the portrait of one of three celebrity sitters.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Nolan and Baileys honeymoon is more of a nightmare than a dream when it turns into an active crime scene; Tim and Celina partner up and must uncover the identity of a John Doe.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Its Officer Aaron Thorsens first day back since the assault, and hes tasked with a series of high-stress cases to determine whether hes ready to work; the team investigates a homicide case with a potential tie to the pentagram killer.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Monroes potion-making goes awry. Meanwhile Nick and Hank unravel a case involving a fugitive father and daughter who arent what they seem.

programme.title: Warehouse 13
programme.desc: Pete and Myka attempt to halt MacPhersons plan to auction off potentially dangerous artefacts.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Rapid Response
programme.desc: Following rapid response officers, the fastest cops in Britain, as they crack down on crime.

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: Bonfire night brings back-to-back emergency calls. Masked youths hurl fireworks at officers out on patrol and a search for a missing girl takes an unusual turn.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: The Luangwa River winds through the savannahs of Zambia. A family of elephants journeys through the bush and a young calf struggling to master the art of using his unwieldy trunk.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: Introducing some of the big characters including `class clown Valentino and `Big Boy Beni. There is also an emergency arrival with teenage mum Clara and her baby Clarita and vets round up the older orangutans, who are now ready to be released.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: Devon Island is the largest uninhabited island in the world, so remote and forbidding that scientists chose Devon to simulate living conditions on Mars. Devons barren landscape only supports the hardiest of plants and animals.

programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

programme.desc: Hidden within a fairytale new marriage is a web of deceit, manipulation and secret love affairs that lead to shocking and deadly consequences.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his 1899 Appletons Guidebook to Alaska, Michael Portillo rides the Alaska Railroad north to explore the remote former gold rush settlement of Talkeetna. Deep in the forest outside town, Michael gets a taste of the pioneering spirit of early 20th century prospectors and settlers from a modern day `homesteader and helps fell a tree to clear land for a log cabin.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a second spectacular rail journey through Alaska into Canada on the White Pass and Yukon railway. Arriving in Skagway by seaplane from railwayless Juneau, Michael heads first for Dyea and the Chilkoot trail, which the first gold prospectors hiked a hundred years ago to the Klondike. Among them, he discovers, was author, Jack London, whose stories of sled dogs captured the spirit of the gold rush.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek dives into the lost Jowett marque, as a 1952 Javelin finds an unexpected home. Meanwhile, Paul and Dave find a Ford Escort thats been untouched for 30 years and set to work on it.

programme.desc: A 1970s Bond Bug three-wheeler divides opinion among Mathewsons customers, while a retired engineer reluctantly auctions off his fathers treasured 60s Jaguar Mark 2.

programme.title: The Great War in Numbers
programme.desc: Around 25,000 miles of trenches were cut as the sides dug in and UK factories built 30,000 aircraft a year.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team arrive in west Wales at the birthplace of King Henry VII, Pembroke Castle. Relics brought in by visitors include a collection of intimate photographs that tell the poignant story of the last days of the Russian royal family, the Romanovs, whilst in captivity in 1917.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A return visit for Fiona Bruce and the experts to the beautiful setting of Pembroke Castle in west Wales. Objects featured include a beguilingly rare sapphire ring that changes colour in different light, Pope Pius XIIs papal hat, and a collection of remarkable Anglo-India paintings from 1780.

programme.title: Burma with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon journeys up the vast Irrawaddy river to the old royal capital of Mandalay, home to an exotic market for precious jade.
